roleset.name: to intrude, take advantage, overstep, enter without permission

example.name: trespass-v: transitive
example.text: Excision of appropriations riders that-1 [*T*-1] trespass on the president 's duties and prerogative under Article II would be different from the line-item veto .
example.arg: on the president 's duties and prerogative under Article II

example.name: trespass-n
example.text: We have clear evidence of his illegal trespass on Palton's property...
